name: Monopoly War
body:
![Picture](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/14202683/10865329/133054a0-7fc5-11e5-9a79-86b3a0f7fa5f.png)
### Welcome to Monopoly War!
Monopoly War takes all the main elements of monopoly and adds the function of armies. With armies, instead of having to pay rent you can simply taker over one's settlement(as long as your army is strong enough). This game was specially produced by: Vincent Costa, Tyler Cook, and Jessica Jacinto. 

### Pre-Alpha
**This game is still in pre-alpha and is still being worked on. Many features as of right now are missing and some bugs are present within the code**


### Versions

**v 0.5** - Added armies, fixed most major bugs

**v 0.35** - Player menu added, fixed parking bug

**v 0.31** - Bug fixes

**v 0.3** - Tiles can be upgraded, board images added, bug fixes

**v 0.25** - Menu fix, new package sources, jail has been added, pay rent has been added

**v 0.2** - Menu animation and board picture 

**v 0.15** - Player movement and dice rolling with tile purchasing

**v 0.1** - Basic Code has been added with dice


### Authors and Contributors
**Vincent Costa** - Main Programmer, Project Director, Debugger                                                                      

**Tyler Cook** - Concept Design and Networking                                                                              

**Jessica Jacinto** - AI, Music, Images, and Sounds

### Support or Contact
Experiencing a bug? Contact us at: costa.vincent@hotmail.com with subject: Monopoly War
